channel.title: Bible on Jiyu
channel.description: Recent content in Bible on Jiyu

item.title: The word 'Word' in Bible
item.description: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. John 1:1 (ESV) And God said, “Let there be light,” and there was light. Genesis 1:3 NIV Therefore this is what the LORD says: “If you repent, I will restore you that you may serve me; if you utter worthy, not worthless, words, you will be my spokesman. Jeremiah 15:19 NIV Then Jesus looked up and said, “Father, I thank you that you have heard me.
